subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Leaky bullpens were the scourge of both teams, each of which blew late-inning leads before the Milwaukee Brewers finally defeated the Mets, 7-6, in their final at-bat.
snippet: Leaky bullpens were the scourge of both teams, each of which blew late-inning leads before the Milwaukee Brewers finally defeated the Mets, 7-6, in their final at-bat.
